location.name: Bakkerij De Gouden Korrel
location.description: A traditional Dutch bakery in the town center

script.situation: At a traditional bakery, a customer buys bread and something sweet.

dialogue.speaker: Sanne
dialogue.translation: Good morning, what would you like?

dialogue.speaker: Pieter
dialogue.text: Goedemorgen, ik wil één brood en twee broodjes, alstublieft.
dialogue.translation: Good morning, I want one loaf of bread and two rolls, please.

dialogue.speaker: Sanne
dialogue.text: Wilt u nog iets? Misschien een koekje?
dialogue.translation: Would you like anything else? Maybe a cookie?

dialogue.speaker: Pieter
dialogue.text: Ja, doe ook maar één koekje.
dialogue.translation: Yes, I’ll also take one cookie.

dialogue.speaker: Sanne
dialogue.text: Dat is samen vier euro, alstublieft.
dialogue.translation: That is four euros in total, please.

dialogue.speaker: Sanne
dialogue.text: Dank u wel, en hier is één euro terug.
dialogue.translation: Thank you, and here is one euro back.

dialogue.speaker: Pieter
dialogue.translation: Thank you, have a nice day!

questions.question: What does Pieter buy first?
options: One loaf of bread and two rolls
